IndexPage.title: Welcome to PeakX
IndexPage.description: We organize information on influencers from all over the world (starting with Japan!). Our mission is to continue optimizing and providing that information in a way that matches the interests of our users. We will introduce influencers from YouTube, Twitch, Tiktok, and Instagram.

AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.description: Learn more about our services and beliefs.
